title: Hiring Immediate Full Time Video Editor for Lifestyle/Travel Channel
job_overview:
Full-Time YouTube Video Editor – Long-Term Opportunity + Performance Bonuses

We’re hiring a skilled and reliable video editor for our growing YouTube channel. This is a full-time, long-term position for someone who can not only edit videos but also source footage, work quickly, and help create high-retention content that performs. 

Job Responsibilities:

Create long-form Videos for YouTube.

Edit engaging YouTube videos using Adobe Premiere and After Effects.

Source video clips relevant to each topic (must be royalty-free, copyright-free)

Utilize ChatGPT, Story Blocks, Tube Magic, HeyGen, and Leonardo as needed for AI generation, voiceovers, and scripting tools (Password Authorized)

Communicate and collaborate via Upgrade to see actual info during working hours.

Handle occasional rush edits (bonus eligible)

Consistently deliver on deadlines, 12 videos minimum (bonus every 12 videos completed)

Bonuses Offered:

Performance Bonuses based on video likes:

10,000 likes 

100,000 likes 

1M likes 

Rush Project Bonuses

Output Bonus every 12 videos delivered

Requirements:

Must complete a 30-second test edit to be considered

Available during agreed working hours

Strong sense of visual storytelling, pacing, and hook building

Proactive, responsive, and communicative

Willing to use Upgrade to see actual info for team chat

Looking for someone fast, creative, and ready to grow with a channel that rewards great work.
Please share links to your previous work and confirm your experience with the tools listed above.

Serious and experienced applicants ONLY.
